Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "You are now speaking to a pre-programmed personality AI construct... Knowing your tardiness, I've left this behind. Anyhow, please learn the importance of being on time.", 4: '1'}
{2: "What's the deal?", 3: '9', 4: 'We were just getting ready.', 5: '10'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Straight to the point, eh? Works for me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Looks like you know what's coming next.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'According to your recent battle logs, the research team has created a new training environment.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "You know it—Project Babel. We've calibrated and optimized the program. And, also added new elements.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Environmental simulation: "Venus Splash Park" >> Battle log 1... Now loading...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'I expect a better performance this time—provide me with more useful data. Only then can Project Babel move in a better direction.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'A better direction?', 3: '30', 4: 'What do I have to do?', 5: '30', 6: "And I'm still not getting paid for this, eh?", 7: '30'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Just complete the operation and write a report as usual.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "No point worrying about the details. It'll affect your performance.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'After all, the training my team prepared this time is quite the jawbreaker.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Anyhow, just get ready. To prepare for stronger enemies in the future, I'll need all the data I can get for reference.", 4: '1'}
